meanings.sent1: The taxpayers in our town help fund the local schools.
meanings.sent2: Every year, taxpayers must file their tax returns with the government.
meanings.sent3: The taxpayers were not happy when they realized they had to pay more taxes than expected.
meanings.sent4: The burden of taxes weighs heavily on the shoulders of hardworking taxpayers.
meanings.sent5: Without taxpayers, the government would not have enough funds to provide essential services.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals or entities who are required to pay taxes to the government.
meanings.sent1: Our country relies on taxpayers to contribute to public services.
meanings.sent2: The taxpayers gathered to discuss the upcoming changes in tax laws.
meanings.sent3: The group of taxpayers decided to hire a tax consultant to help them navigate the new regulations.
meanings.sent4: The government depends on taxpayers to fulfill their financial obligations.
meanings.sent5: The taxpayers play a crucial role in the functioning of our society.
